test.control_if_2: {if 1 == 1}{$test.variable} is{if 2 == 2} awesome{if 1 == 1} and {if 5==5}fun {else}not ok{/if}{/if}but there is a lot todo {else}different {/if}end.{else} start with {$test.variable}{/if}
test.control_if_3: test{if 1 == 1} water{if 2 == 2} grain{if 1 == 1} test{/if} butter{else} atre{/if} end{else} dus {$test.variable}{/if}
test.control_if_5: {if file_exists("{$dir.vendor}")}Vendor directory exists {/if}{if file_exists({$dir.root})}and also exists here{else}{file_test(test.variable)}{/if}

output.control_if_1: testing true with some extra text
output.control_if_2: Priya is awesome and fun but there is a lot todo end.
output.control_if_3: test water grain test butter end
output.control_if_5: Vendor directory exists and also exists here
